ca.proj.game.entities
Class NPC

java.lang.Object
  ca.proj.game.entities.Entity
      ca.proj.game.entities.Mob
          ca.proj.game.entities.NPC

public class NPC
extends Mob

NPC.java represents non-playable-characters in game.
